111.content:
You take a moment to sit down, placing your long-awaited invention on the desk and looking at it with a sense of awe and accomplishment. For 2 years, you had designed, constructed, tested, retested, scrapped, reworked, theorized, and driven yourself to the point of exhaustion. And now those two years had finally been met with a device that you knew would change the entire course of your life. You had tested it a couple of times each way, but nothing much for fear of unintended side effects. Nothingwas wrong with the device, so you knew you would have full control over it when you used it.

The nanites the ray would place in the body allowed the ray to do its work and helped the body along. They also acted as a remote, able to control your size according to your whims if you wanted to change. The ray itself would only store a few charges, but the nanites were fueled by solar energy collected in your outer cells. It was, in a word, flawless, or so your eager ego told you.

Now, you pick up the device and ready it for activation. Suddenly, you ponder something. You know you want to shrink with this device, but where do you want to be when you become smaller?
111.title: To think to shrink

113.content:
You gingerly lift the ray, still hesitant about even holding it. In your hands rest over four thousand dollars and countless hours of hard work and experimentation, and if it broke, you'd have to start practically from scratch. You look at the ray, slightly bigger than the average pistol, admiring the sleek chrome cover you gave it and running your finger across the red dial on the side. After so long, to finally hold it in your hands... eagerness overwhelms you, your tail flicking back and forth as you think of all the things you can do!

But first, you want to use it to shrink someone... The idea of taking someone's size away and watching them dwindle away, their clothes growing right off of them as you tower over them with a smile on your face... Your sheath idly stirs at the mere thought, and you shiver in delight.

But who? Who would be a good first victim? Your mother and sister are right here in the house, convenient and easy to shrink. But then, you could have so much fun with one (or even both!) of your friends, especially since you knew that at least Tim had a crush on you and would probably like the idea of being so naked and so close to you.

Of course, those aren't your only choices. You know more than just those two guys, and if you wanted to shrink someone you didn't know, the possibilities were practically limitless!
113.title: A First Victim...
